projects.title: Video Calling
projects.description: This is a basic video calling app. User can use this app without an account. whenever a user visit the web page he/she will be given an unique ID. He/She then needs to send the ID to other person he/she wants to call. Then the other person will use the id to call them. One ID can only be used for one call.
